I haven't been following this thread, so this comment may be redundant...

One source to look at for testing SWT things is Kent Beck's TDD book 
(http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0321146530/102-3564878-6025713?v=glance).  
I read it some time back, but as I recall he goes through creating the JUnit 
plug-in in a test-first fashion.  So, he's bound to have tests in the book 
for SWT components.

-- 
Jason Rogers
